title: The Wasteland
description: The world ended and with it so did the rules.  I was stolen from my family and raised in the Wastelands to the North. I did what I had to ensure my survival. I became The Champion, with my history carved into my skin for all to see.  Now I spend my days drinking and hiding from my past until four newcomers offer me a job I can’t refuse. When my past and future mix I must once again rise and fight. This time it’s not for my freedom, it's for my happiness.  *Contains triggers and a cliffhanger ending. This is a dark Dystopian RH.
author: K.A. Knight
